casebody.data:
Dontay EARLY
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 29, 2017

James E. Mortimer, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Dontay Early's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 907, 154 A.3d 1123 (2017), is denied.
